name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screenshot.rocks: One-click screenshot capture and design mockups

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create beautiful browser and mobile mockups in one-click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture stunning browser screenshots in just one click with Screenshot.rocks. 

Turn your screenshots into beautiful, professional images wrapped in customizable browser or mobile frames. Whether you're sharing them for presentations, social media, or branding, Screenshot.rocks ensures your screenshots always look polished.

You can export your screenshots in popular formats such as PNG, JPG, or SVG. Choose from a variety of styles, colors, and backgrounds to match your brand's identity, making every screenshot uniquely yours.

Screenshot.rocks is lightweight, ad-free, and requires no unnecessary permissions. Plus, it's fully open-source. You can explore the code on GitHub by visiting github.com/daveearley/screenshot.rocks.

Never send a boring screenshot again with Screenshot.rocks!
